p: In parallel with treatment, the use of antiretroviral drugs as a prevention tool has been a focus from the beginning of the antiretroviral-therapy (ART) era. [ 11] In theory, the widespread use of ART could lead to a reduction in the rate of HIV transmission in the entire population and contribute to the control of the HIV pandemic. [ 12, 13] It is controversial whether receiving ART influences syphilis incidence or whether immunologic improvement through ART is related to the incidence of syphilis in HIV-infected patients.
